LanguageData.P42_TL_DisturbanceIncreaseExplosion: The boom of a nearby explosion caused the Phonosphere's disturbance to increase.
LanguageData.P42_TL_DisturbanceIncreaseThunder: A loud thunderclap caused the Phonosphere's disturbance to increase.
LanguageData.P42_TL_DisturbanceGunshots: The sound of nearby gunshots caused the Phonosphere's disturbance to increase.
LanguageData.P42_TL_PhonosphereDisturbanceAlertDesc: The Phonosphere is at a dangerously high disturbance level. At this level it can cause severe damage to the colony.
